He has already had six loans with the IMCEC and has repaid them. He is requesting another loan of 200,000 francs for buying a cornière sewing machine, so as to diversify his products. His ambition is to open a large sewing store and to boost his supplies further.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Jehova Es Mi Pastor 3 & 4 Group

texts.en:
Milady is the coordinator of her group Jehova es mi Pastor 3 & 4 (God is my Pastor). This group is located in Santiago, an area famous for tobacco and beef production and the second biggest city in the Dominican Republic. The members are running different business such as clothing sales, shoes, beauty salon, grocery stores and others. 

Milady is excited to be taking her 4th loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She operates a vegetables and fruit stall next to her house; from there she can take care of her child and generate income as the same time. She plans to use this loan to invest in her stand by buying vegetables and fruits, also she wants to rebuild the stand so as to have a nicer and bigger one. That is the reason why she is planning to buy some wood; now she has more demand and she will need to invest more in her business. She will use the profits to expand the business and get her own house to live comfortably.

After Esperanza´s loans she has been able to produce more and to live a little bit more tranquilly than before. The capital she invested from every loan is expanding her business. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: to buy wood, vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is a 32-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife. He has owned a barber shop since 2004 with seven years of experience working in the same occupation. He is well known in the whole region for his good business reputation and his great welcoming. Today, he is requesting to borrow $1,200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase an air conditioner for his shop and renew his business tools. His income is considered almost reasonable and he struggles to be able to face the uncomfortable life circumstances. In the future, he is planning to improve his work and enlarge his shop.

loans.use: to purchase an air conditioner for his shop and renew his business tools

loans.name: Armida Del Carmen

texts.es:
Armida, vive con su esposo, ella se dedica a la venta D. comida, bebidas, tiene 21 años en el negocio, surgió por iniciativa propia, y por el momento es la única fuente D. ingreso para ella.
Armida solicita un préstamo para la compra D. productos como aceite, condimentos, azúcar, gaseosas, materiales para refrescos, todo para el negocio, con el propósito D. tener surtido el comedor y estar preparada para atender la demanda.
La aspiración D. Armida es mejorar su negocio, contar con todo lo necesario para preparar los alimentos y satisfacer a los clientes, garantizándose un mejor progreso en su hogar.
texts.en:
Armida lives with her husband and sells food and drinks. She has had her business for 21 years and began it at her own initiative. At the moment it is her only source of income.

Armida is requesting a loan to buy products such as oil, condiments, sugar, soft drinks, ingredients for beverages, all for her business, with the objective of stocking her dining room and being prepared to meet demand.

Armida’s goal is to improve her business by acquiring all she needs to prepare food and satisfy her customers, thereby guaranteeing a better income for her home.

loans.use: to buy oil, condiments, sugar and soft drinks, for her business.

loans.name: Tukei

texts.en:
Tukei is 28 years old. He is married and has two children. He is a farmer and has been doing this for the last seven years. His farm is in a productive area which has proved to be good for mixed farming.

He learned about KADET through a marketing campaign done by KADET staff in the area where he lives. He has been a good client and this will be his first loan which he is planning to use to buy farm supplies. He hopes to use the profit from this loan to build a new house and educate his children.

His hope and dream is to buy and build a rental premise. He is a young and energetic man who can do more if supported financially.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies

loans.name: Luisa Idalia

texts.es:
En el municipio de Telica departamento de León, la señora Luisa Idalia Castellón M., se dedica arduamente a la labor como maestro de primaria, en un pequeño colegio del municipio, dedicándose a esa labor desde hace 12 años, es soltera con 3 hijos a los que tiene que proporcionarles las condiciones necesarias para su desarrollo.
Una de las necesidades que la señora luisa atraviesa hoy en día, es de mejorar sus condiciones de su vivienda debido a que ha estado en malas condiciones, por lo que ha tomado la decisión de acudir a ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de materiales de construcción como Zinc, para realizar las mejora de la vivienda realizando el cambio de techo, para mayor seguridad de su vivienda, por medio de esta obra brindara mejores condiciones de vida a sus hijos
Es importante destacar que por medio de la realización de esta obra le proporcionara a su familia mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
In the municipality of Telica, in the department of León, Señora Luisa Idalia Castellón M., works hard as a primary school teacher at a small school. She has been doing this for the last 12 years. She is single and has 3 children for whom she has to provide with the conditions necessary for their development.

One of the problems that Señora Luisa faces today is how to improve the condition of her house at it is in a state of bad repair. This has made her take the decision to ask Ceprodel for a loan to buy building materials such as zinc so as to make the improvements to the house by changing the roof. This will improve security and provide better living conditions for her children.

It is important to point out that by accomplishing this work will provide her family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy zinc and pay for labour to improve a roof.

loans.name: Maria De La Luz

texts.es:
La señora Maria de la Luz tiene 36 años de edad, vive en la aldea el Pedrerito la Montaña y se dedica a la venta de golosinas desde hace 4 años, sus ventas las realiza en las fincas meloneras y cañeras de la zona sur del pais, sus clientes son empleados de estas fincas y sus ventas son al credito, Maria todos los dias se levanta muy temprano para preparar sus golosinas para luego salir a venderlas.
Maria vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos, tiene casa propia.
la meta de Maria es remodelar su casa para darles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria de la Luz is 36 years old and lives in the village of El Pedrerito la Montaña.  She has been selling food for four years.  She makes her sales on the melon and sugar plantations in the south of the country.  Her customers are people who work on these farms and she makes her sales on credit.  Every day, Maria gets up very early to prepare her food so that she can then go out and sell it.

María lives with her husband and three children.  She owns her own home.

María's goal is to remodel her house so that she can provide her children with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy beef, pork, chicken, gas, tortillas, vegetables, oil, butter, seasonings, bread, eggs, beans, rice, soft drinks, and disposable plates and cups

loans.name: Lemi

texts.en:
Lemi is 38 years old, married to Rachael. Together they have two children aged eight and two years old. He is a carpenter and has been in the business for the past seven years. He gets a monthly income of KES 18,000 from the business.

This is his third loan. He paid his previous loans successfully. He will use the loan amount to purchase timber, varnish, and old furniture for repair and resale.

He will use the anticipated profit to pay school fees for his children and also provide for the family's basic needs. His dream is to purchase the necessary business tools in order to handle bigger furniture vendors.

loans.use: to purchase timber, varnish, and old furniture
